# shivam-npm-singh

# What is this?

First NPM Package Created By Shivam Singh For Testing.

## Installation

```
$ npm install shivam-npm-singh
```

## How to use

```
const { shivamPrintFunc } = require("shivam-npm-singh");

const myPrint = new shivamPrintFunc("Shivam", 23, "Mirzapur");

myPrint.printData();

```
